entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who snarled and repeated what Ron said. She is described as checking her watch and looking anxiously toward the door.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who smiled but then had his smile fade from his face. He is described as saying 'Yeah . . .'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as asking who was supposed to be meeting them and taking a swig of butterbeer.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as one of the people arriving at the pub with Dean and Lavender.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as one of the people arriving at the pub with Neville and Lavender.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as one of the people arriving at the pub with Neville and Dean.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is mentioned as one of the people arriving at the pub with Padma Patil and Cho.

entities.name: padma patil
entities.description: Padma Patil is mentioned as one of the people arriving at the pub with Parvati Patil and Cho.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as one of the people arriving at the pub with Parvati Patil and Padma Patil.

relationships.description: Harry took a swig of butterbeer.
